name: #Headlight
description:
Take a Leap Motion and pour beams of liquid light down your beautiful face. #Enjoy #Share #Glow


For more information on how we made #Headlight, and to see the actual booth we made for it, check out our art show called We've Traveled So Far. Learn more at http://wevetraveledsofar.com

To change resolutions, hold Option while opening on Mac, or Shift while opening on Windows
